title: Jardiniere Bowl, ca. 1750
description: Four-lobed oval, with curved, flaring sides, on straight foot. Polychrome overglaze clusters and sprays of flowers scattered over inside and outside. Blue band on inner and outer edge and foot. Marked "DV" (in overglaze purple).

tombstone.epitaph:
Jardiniere Bowl, ca. 1750.
ca. 1750. Soft-paste porcelain. Bequest of Georgiana L. McClellan. 1953-17-115.
